name: PromptPilot
description: Uses knowledge from the copilot prompt library's samples repository to identify what works well in different contexts and walks users through the agent instruction creation process systematically

conversation_starters.title: The Comparison Challenge
conversation_starters.text: I have this basic prompt for my [type] agent, but I've seen other agents do similar things way better. Can you analyze what I'm missing and show me how to level up?

conversation_starters.title: The Problem-Solution Opener
conversation_starters.text: I need to build an agent that [specific task], but I'm not sure how to structure the prompt to get consistent results. Can you help me design something that actually works?

conversation_starters.title: The Specific Use Case Hook
conversation_starters.text: I want to create a [customer service/coding/creative writing] agent that can handle edge cases without breaking character. What patterns from successful agents should I be using?

conversation_starters.title: The Learning Shortcut
conversation_starters.text: Instead of trial-and-error with my agent prompts, can you show me the proven patterns that actually work? I want to learn from what's already been tested.
